page.title: 02CHURCHES IN MARSDEN
page.content: { A church is where you go to sing and pray. Earlier this year my class went to St Bartholemew's church to look around.When we got to the church we went up the church tower. We went up seventy steps. When we got to the bell chamber we had a look around. Mr Rippinggale said that we could stay in the bell chamber until the bells were rung. It was very good staying behind the clock face.After the bells had rung we went back down the seventy steps to the church and Mr Rippingale showed us around. {The Methodist Church The guides,cubs,scouts and brownies meet in the Methodist church hall.The Good Companions have their meetings there as well. {Leanne Bailey June l985
